note.p: Career: Reader in Thermodynamics, Oxford University; ex-Technical Consultant to the Explosives Department of the Ministry of Munitions; member of Governing Body, Winchester College (1944-1959)
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1960 vol 6 pp 39-64, plate, by D M Newitt
References: William McGucken, 'The Royal Society and the Genesis of the Scientific Advisory Committee to Britain's War Cabinet, 1939-1940' in NR 1978-9 vol 33 pp 87-115
